text: ohu ahasda, bhumiyada, utpadanaya kara tibimehida, ratriya ha dahavala maruven maruvata pæminimehida, minisunta prayojanayak at kara dima magin sagarayanhi yatra karana nævhida, (karkasaka vi) mæri giya bhumiyata pana dimata (sasrika kirimata) allah ahasin væsimata salasvana varsavada, siyaluma vargaye satunda bhumiyehi visiri sitimada, sulanga vividha disavanta (harava) harava yævimehida, ahasata ha bhumiyata atara palanaya karanu læba æti ghana valakulehida, (minisunta æti phala prayojana gæna paryesanaya kara) sitana janatavata (ohuge dayavada, adarayada dænum denu labana aneka) sadhakayan niyata vasayenma ætteya
